mapper.sql: id, order_id, operate_man, create_time, order_status, note

mapper.select:
select
from oms_order_operate_history oooh inner join oms_order oo on oooh.order_id=oo.id where oo.id=#{orderId}
mapper.insert: insert into oms_order_operate_history (order_id, operate_man, create_time, order_status, note) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{operateMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into oms_order_operate_history (order_id, operate_man, create_time, order_status, note) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update oms_order_operate_history
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
operate_man = #{operateMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
